name: Postout
description:
Game I made for 2022 Epic megajam. Jams theme was ”As Above So Below” so I desided to create puzzle game where you solve puzzles ”upside down and downside up”. Game has 5 test chambers. This game was made in week so expect some bugs.

Theres no controller support so use mouse and keyboard.

Short trailer: https://youtu.be/WSAD6Fmf358

Playtime: ~10-15 minutes.
